alert.note: Alert for Cuyahoga; Lorain (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 6:40PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Cuyahoga and north central Lorain Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 639 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm offshore of Avon Lake, or 10 miles northeast of Lorain, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph from the outflow of this storm. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cleveland, Lorain, Lakewood, Euclid, Cleveland Heights, Westlake, Avon Lake, Warrensville Heights, Highland Hills, Garfield Heights, Shaker Heights, South Euclid, Avon, Rocky River, East Cleveland, Fairview Park, Bay Village, Lyndhurst, University Heights and Beachwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for north central and northeastern Ohio.
